message: @laughingchance I think the profile pics come from Gravatar.
Now I'm off to look around. Sorry for the multiple posts - just realised that hitting the carriage return gives me a new post.
Ah - haven't used that for years. Thanks :)
No great issue, I'm just curious how this magic happened.

Sorry if this has been answered, but I've searched and can't see anything. I just signed up after hearing Leah interviewed on Net @ Nite. I clicked on the Facebook signup but changed my mind after seeing what access the site wanted to my Facebook information. I clicked "Don't allow" several times but the page simple refreshed. I killed the browser tab and started again. This time I set up a standard login. However, when I logged in the site was displaying the attached graphic which is one I use for some sites. I just wonder where it got it from? It's the one I use for Twitter but I didn't use my Twitter account to sign in and although my user name is the same the site can't know that I'm the same person - or can it?
@laughingchance not really bad etiquette here to send a few replies to a topic. Convore is a cross between forum and chat.
